## AbstractGenerator.init() method

Initialize the generator. Copies options.

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(callbacks: CompilerCallbacks, options: GeneratorOptions): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callbacks | CompilerCallbacks | Callbacks for external interfaces, including message reporting and file io |
|  options | [GeneratorOptions](./kmc-generate.generatoroptions.md) | Generator options |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

false if initialization fails
